title: Bugsplat transitioning from champ select to loading screen
body: Just gets another bugsplat every time I try to reconnect.  I've already tried both the new client and the legacy, but the issue persists.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are usually caused by a system driver or hardware issue, therefore I'd like you to work through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address the most common solutions for this issue before we investigate further together.

Let me know if those steps were able to resolve this issue.
